'#e0f3f8',// 4 - Moderate pain

];return painColors[Math.min(level,10)];};const painLegendItems=Array.from({length:11},(_,i)=>i).map(level=>({color:getPainColor(level),label:"".concat(level)}));const{start:startOfWeek,end:endOfWeek}=nav.getDateRange();const weekPainData=painData.filter(d=>d.date>=startOfWeek&&d.date<=endOfWeek);// Get 3-month data
